about_the_game:
Hop on-board for an exclusive behind-the-scenes journey with the 'Station to Station Digital Artbook'.

This richly-illustrated treasury features:

  • Early blueprints and sketches
  • Evocative concept art
  • First-look early build screenshots
  • Lush beauty shots and final game screenshots
  • Detailed voxel-art models of architectural marvels, locomotives, and the natural world
  • Conductors' notes - insightful commentary from the developers themselves

The artbook charts the game's evolution from its initial doodles, like a fledgling local line, all the way to its completion as a sprawling, voxel-art rail network.

Signal ahead for creativity and innovation as you leaf through this artistic logbook. It's a must-have for any train aficionado wanting to delve deeper into the world of 'Station to Station'.
